actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To amend the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to require public notice and local hearings before property is made available under that Act for use to assist the homeless, and for other purposes.
short_title: Community and Homeless Cooperation Act of 1995
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Community and Homeless Cooperation Act of 1995 - Amends the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to: (1) require public notice and local hearings before property is made available under such Act; and (2) share the proceeds from the sale of an unused or underutilized property with existing facilities and the Treasury.

titles.title: Community and Homeless Cooperation Act of 1995

To amend the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to require public notice and local hearings before property is made available under that Act for use to assist the homeless, and for other purposes.
